IgA nephropathy (Bergers disease) with extra-renal manifestations

Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) (e.g., Crohns disease, ulcerative colitis)
Lymphoma (e.g., Hodgkin lymphoma, some Non-Hodgkin lymphomas)

Gastroparesis (while this was a listed symptom, it is often a diagnosis requiring management)
Epistaxis (nosebleed) - consider underlying causes like bleeding disorders or trauma
Leukemia (rare, but important to consider with these symptoms)

Immunodeficiency disorders (e.g., Common variable immunodeficiency, X-linked agammaglobulinemia)
